name: Shleep Chaser
description:
Shleep Chaser is challenging puzzle game where you have to catch all the sheeps in different levels in order to get some sleep. The thing is they will not be as compliant as you expect ...

This game was made for the Mouse Jam 2 game jam. Please download it for the best experience.

Assets used : 

  • Sound effects : Pixabay
  • Player character animation : Mixamo

Otherwise i made everything by myself.
